title: Upgrading App (Retaining Feature Access/Settings)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the current Store build version installed from Google Play
And the user has logged in with an entitled account
And the user has set Favorite Team(s)
custom_steps:
When the user logs in to Google Play with a whitelisted account
And updates to the new version available in Alpha
And launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user's login information will be retained
And the user's feature access will be retained
And the user's Favorite Teams will be retained
And the user's notification settings will be retained (verify that notifications are actually still received according to settings)
Verify the build number corresponds to the build under test (this can be located by selecting the About MLB tab for mobile and tablets or on the Settings screen for TV in the bottom right corner in small print)

title: Handset - Video Launch Points
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with the app installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to play video from the following sections:

custom_steps_separated.content: Team Page videos section (handset only)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the highlight opens and can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Highlights tab on the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the embedded highlight will play
And the highlight can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: News Article (has an embedded video to lead it off)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the embedded highlight will play
And the highlight can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Video token from a News Article (within the article as you scroll down)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the embedded highlight will play
And the highlight can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the highlight opens and can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Gameday Feed tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the highlight opens and can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Gameday Videos section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the highlight opens and can be watched in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content:
Condensed Game or Game Recap
Note: Navigate to a final game from the regular season on the scoreboard, click the game to view Gameday screen, Click Videos tab from Gameday screen. Scroll all the way down to see Game Recap and Condensed Game.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the highlight Condensed Game or Game Recap opens and can be watched in its entirety

title: In-App Purchase
custom_preconds: Free Trial Testing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the MLB Audio option
AND purchases the subscription through the Play Store purchase flow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the transaction is successful
AND the user can dismiss the "Follow the Game Wherever You Go" screen
AND the user will have MLB Audio access (Ex. Gameday Audio)
AND the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the MLB Audio user then accesses the MLB.tv paywall
AND purchases MLB.tv Monthly successfully
AND then links to a MLB account from the "Follow the Game Wherever You Go" screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will have access to MLB.tv and Gameday Audio
AND the user will not see Lite ads 
AND the MLB account will display in purchases

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user uninstalls the build
AND reinstalls the build
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the App will automatically restore the purchase for the user 
AND the user's purchases (MLB Audio Monthly and MLB.tv Monthly) will be restored
AND the user will have MLB Audio and MLB.tv access

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user installs the build on another device
AND launches the app
AND accesses a paywall
AND logs in with their MLB account (FROM STEP 2)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will have access to MLB Audio and MLB.tv

title: MLB.tv - Switching Feeds
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps: When a user is watching an MLB.TV video
custom_expected: Accounts - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/2019+Commerce+Entitlements

custom_steps_separated.content: AND MLB.TV Premium user taps on another feed of the game in the broadcast options (comes up when you press the tv icon)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Media Framework check appears
and the user is let into the other feed

custom_steps_separated.content: AND MLB.TV Premium user taps on a feed that is blacked out
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Media Framework check appears
and the blackout message appears

custom_steps_separated.content: AND single team user taps on a the other feed of the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Media Framework check appears
and the single team message appears restricting them from watching the feed

title: Chromecast
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat has been installed
and the user is on the same network as a Google Chromecast device
and the user is testing in Alpha or Prod

This testing doesn't apply to amazon devices as chromecast is not supported
Chromecast functionality will not be available in QA

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user looks at the section header (e.g. Scoreboard, News, Team Page, Standings)
and taps on the Google Cast icon in the top right corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an overlay will display
AND all Chromecast devices found on the network will appear
AND all device names will display correctly

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects an available Chromecast device
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Google Cast icon will show as enabled
AND it will now appear filled in with white

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the app is connected to a Chromecast device
and the user launches an MLB.TV feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the stream should launch on the Chromecast device
And the user should be taken to the video controller view on their handset

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the app is connected to a Chromecast device
and the user launches VOD content (video highlights, video in news article, Gameday video)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the VOD should launch on the Chromecast device
And the user should be taken to the video controller view on their handset

custom_steps_separated.content:
Verify player controls function while casting
(play/pause, Closed Captioning, switching feeds)
custom_steps_separated.expected: The expected behavior should occur on the Chromecast device

custom_steps_separated.content: when the device date is current date after 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the current day's games

title: Location Permissions
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user launches a fresh install of the app
WHEN the user reaches the favorite team selector
THEN the user should be presented with a location permissions popup

GIVEN a user launching a fresh install of the MLB app
WHEN the user denies location permission at the favorite team selector
AND then attempts to watch a game stream
THEN the user should be prompted with another location prompt
AND when the user denies that prompt they should see a "Location not enabled" screen with an "Enable" button that will take them to the App Info page for MLB where they can enable location permissions (screenshot below)

NOTE: There is a known bug where the "Location not enabled, please enable location to continue" text does not currently display. This is currently expected, so do not mark this test as failed for this bug. Delete this note when the bug has been addressed.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/11778237)

custom_steps: Launch Audio feed on Android mobile
custom_expected:
User successfully streams Audio
User can stream Audio for 5 minutes
User can stop Audio
User can pause and play Audio

title: Welcome Screen -> Non onboarded user

And he doesn't finish with Onboarding flow
When he opens the app again
Then He should see the Welcome Screen
And he should see his email
And a button to Continue
And a button to login with a different account

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user
custom_steps:
Given a user who wants to register in the MLB app
When he inputs his information
Then he should start OnBoarding process
And the first screen should be the Follow teams

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user → pick favorite team
custom_steps:
Given a user who has created a new account
And he is in the Follow teams screen
And no team is selected
When he taps on his favorite team
Then the card should be marked as favorite

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user → follow players
custom_steps:
Given a user who has a new account
And he has started with the onBoarding flow
And he is in the follow players screen
When he taps on some players
Then he should see these players marked as followed

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user → Your picks

custom_steps_separated.content: Given an user has registered a new account
custom_steps_separated.expected: user see the success registration screen

custom_steps_separated.content: And he has picked a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Picked team is marked as favorite

custom_steps_separated.content: And he pick other teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: The other picked teams are marked as selected

custom_steps_separated.content: And He follows 5 players
custom_steps_separated.expected: Selected players should appear as followed

custom_steps_separated.content: When he continues the Onboarding process
custom_steps_separated.expected:
He should arrive to the Your Picks screen
And He should see his picks

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user → Your picks → Notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: Given the user has registered a new account
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should see the success account creation screen

custom_steps_separated.content: And he has picked a favorite team and other teams to follow
custom_steps_separated.expected: Picked teams should be marked as selected

custom_steps_separated.content: And he continues the Onboarding process without following any players
custom_steps_separated.expected: He should see  Your picks screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Then He should see the notifications associated to the picks and MLB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
For MLB he should see that News Notifications are selected
For Favorite Teams he should see that Games and News Notifications are selected
For the other teams he should see that the No Notifications option is selected
Also for each card he should see a text according to:

* ALL_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "All Notifications",
* NO_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT : "No Notifications",
* NEWS_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "News notifications",
* GAMES_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "Game notifications",
* NO_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will not receive any notifications about team name news and events",
* NEWS_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive news notifications about team name",
* GAMES_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive game notifications about team name",
* ALL_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive news and game notifications about team name"

title: Welcome Screen → Register a new user → Your picks → User can change notifications
custom_preconds:
Texts to be used:

ALL_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "All Notifications",
NO_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT : "No Notifications",
NEWS_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "News notifications",
GAMES_NOTIFICATIONS_SUMMARY_TEXT: "Game notifications",
NO_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will not receive any notifications about team name news and events",
NEWS_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive news notifications about team name",
GAMES_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive game notifications about team name",
ALL_NOTIFICATIONS_DETAIL_TEXT: "You will only receive news and game notifications about team name"

custom_steps_separated.content: Given the user has registered a new account
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should see the success account creation screen

custom_steps_separated.content: And he has picked a favorite team and other teams to follow
custom_steps_separated.expected: Picked teams should be marked as selected

custom_steps_separated.content: And he continues the Onboarding process without following any players
custom_steps_separated.expected: He should see Your picks screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When he chooses the No Notifications for MLB
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then He should see that the No Notifications is selected and the News Notifications is unselected, also the texts should be updated according to the selection

custom_steps_separated.content: And He chooses New Notifications and unselect the other options for his Favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then He should see that the News Notifications is selected and the other notifications are unselected, also the texts should be updated according to the selection

custom_steps_separated.content: And He chooses Games Notifications and unselect the other options for his other picked teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then He should see that the Games Notifications is selected and the other notifications are unselected, also the texts should be updated according to the selection

title: Lite User Gating -> Audio
custom_preconds: * User is signed in as a non paid account
custom_steps:
Given the user taps on the Gameday Audio button
AND the user selects a feed to stream
custom_expected: THEN the user sees an MLB Audio Paywall

title: Lite User Gating -> Games Tab
custom_preconds: * User is signed in as a non paid account
custom_steps: Given the user selects MLB.TV feed from the Games Tab in the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the MLB.TV Paywall

title: Lite User Gating -> Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds: * User is signed in as a non paid account
custom_steps: Given the user taps on Free Game of the Day from Game Tab in the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN user sees Login screen with Free Game messaging

title: Lite User Gating -> Highlights Tab on the Watch View
custom_preconds: * User is signed in as a non paid account
custom_steps: Given the user taps on highlight in Highlights Tab on the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN video should play in addition to advertisement.

title: Lite User Gating -> Free Content
custom_preconds: * User is signed in as a non paid account
custom_steps: Given the user accesses free content, eg. News, Scores, Standings, Stats, Team Page (including free videos)
custom_expected: THEN the free content will be presented and free videos will play.

title: Menu Item Sections -> Drawer
custom_preconds: * This is applicable to any user
custom_steps: Given the drawer is opened
custom_expected: THEN various menu sections are displayed

custom_expected:
THEN a section label is visible

AND a section divider is visible

title: Menu Item Sections -> Menu Item is Visible and the Item Has an Icon
custom_preconds: * This is applicable to any user
custom_steps: Given menu item is visible AND the item has an icon
custom_expected: THEN the icon is shown first AND Then the item label is displayed

title: Welcome Screen -> Login View -> Valid Credentials
custom_preconds:
* User is on the welcome screen
* User taps login 
* User is taken to login screen
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the login screen 
And enters credentials 
When user's credentials are valid
custom_expected: THEN user should be logged into the app and advanced through the onboarding flow

title: Welcome Screen -> Login View -> Invalid Credentials
custom_preconds:
* User is on the welcome screen
* User taps login 
* User is taken to login screen
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the login screen 
And enters credentials 
When user's credentials are invalid
custom_expected: THEN the user should be shown an error message and asked to try again

title: Welcome Screen → Login View -> Forgot Password
custom_preconds:
* User is on the welcome screen
* User taps login 
* User is taken to login screen
custom_steps: When the user taps "Forgot Password"
custom_expected: THEN the user should be taken to the Forgot Password webflow

title: News Tab -User Taps News Tab
custom_preconds: * App is installed
custom_steps: Given the user taps the news tab
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to the News page

title: News Tab -> User Taps News Tab -> User Clicks Article
custom_preconds:
* App is installed
* User has taped news tab
custom_steps: Given the user has tapped on an article
custom_expected: THE the the user is taken to that news article

title: Welcome Screen → Login View → User lost Internet connection

custom_steps_separated.content: Given the user has logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is in the Home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When he lost his Internet connection
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then He should see an error banner with an error message: Network not available, please check your WiFi or Cellular connection

custom_steps_separated.content: And After some time Internet connection is restored
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then He should see that the error banner disappears automatically.

title: Lite User Gating
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Lite user opens MLB app in Prod

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Gameday Audio button
AND the user selects a feed to stream
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an MLB Audio Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on MLB.TV button from the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV feed from the Games Tab in the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Free Game of the Day from Game Tab in the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees Login screen with Free Game messaging

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Slide out Menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees a Subscribe to MLB Audio upsell button
that launches the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on highlight in Highlights Tab on the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN video should play in addition to advertisement (NOTE: advertisements not yet implemented on beta. Remove this note after implementation)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses free content, eg. News, Scores, Standings, Stats, Team Page (including free videos)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the free content will be presented and free videos will play

title: Main page - light/dark mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the dark theme will be applied as expected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN light mode is selected
